rule.description: The Launch, Sound, Movie, ResetForm, ImportData and JavaScript actions shall not be permitted. Additionally, the deprecated set-state and no-op actions shall not be permitted. The Hide action shall not be permitted (Corrigendum 2)
rule.test: S == "GoTo" || S == "GoToR" || S == "Thread" || S == "URI" || S == "Named" || S == "SubmitForm"

error.message: Unknown or not permitted action type
